name: Skype copy/paste cleanup
description:
Strips the date/time & name from the start of copy/pasted Skype messages.

Not super robust, but handles multiple messages.
content:
[2015-02-18, 9:18:58 PM] Grant Skinner: hello
[2015-02-18, 9:19:23 PM] Grant Skinner: this is some text to test a regular expression that cleans up Skype copy/paste
[2015-02-18, 9:19:47 PM] Grant Skinner: this is a multiline message
line2

this is line 4
[2015-02-18, 9:19:55 PM] Grant Skinner: goodbye
author: Grant Skinner
